contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Contact us anytime - we are ready to help you

about.officialPartner: Official Partner of DEWALT in Georgia

products.maxCompareReached: Maximum 3 products can be added to the comparison list

terms.intro: Please carefully read the purchase, return and delivery conditions before proceeding with your purchase!!!
terms.greeting: Dear customer! Thank you for your interest in our products.
terms.paymentMethods: You can purchase products using Visa or Mastercard cards from Georgian banks
terms.courierService: After payment confirmation, courier delivery service is activated
terms.freeDelivery: Free delivery within Tbilisi for purchases over 150 GEL.
terms.paidDelivery: In all other cases, delivery in Tbilisi is carried out by courier service (5 GEL), in other cities of Georgia by DHL (post), the price of which is determined individually based on weight and dimensions (11-35 GEL).
terms.sameDayDelivery: Delivery within Tbilisi is carried out on the same day if payment is made before 15:00
terms.nextDayDelivery: Delivery within Tbilisi is carried out the next day if payment is made after 15:00
terms.countryDelivery: Delivery throughout Georgia is carried out within no more than 36 hours if payment is made before 15:00
terms.deliveryNote: Variations are allowed during holidays/special events and during special regulations
terms.returnPolicy: The customer can return the goods only "in person" within 3 days if it turns out to be a factory defect.
terms.returnRequirements: Goods can be returned only if all accompanying documents are provided, the packaging (marking) is not damaged, and there are no defects.
terms.returnExclusions: Goods damaged by the customer due to improper operation (overload, mechanical damage, connection to incorrect power source, incorrect consumables, etc.) are not subject to return.
terms.refundConditions: Refund conditions in case of goods return:
terms.refundPolicy: The amount is refunded to the customer on the same account in case of goods return (except for incurred costs)
terms.overpaymentRefund: Overpaid amount is refunded to the customer on the same account (except for incurred costs)
terms.duplicateRefund: Duplicate paid amount is refunded to the customer on the same account (except for incurred costs)
terms.refundTimeline: When returning, the amount is reflected on the customer's account within the standard terms provided by Georgian banks.
terms.privacyIntro: Safely storing your personal information is our main goal.
terms.privacyCommitment: We recognize and respect your right to privacy. Our main goal is to protect all personal information of the customer. Its disclosure to other third parties is prohibited, unless it is the subject of interest of legislative bodies.
terms.privacySecurity: All types of personal information are transmitted through Secure Socket (SSL 256 bit encryption Standard) and stored in a reliable place that is strictly controlled and securely protected.
terms.privacyContact: If you have any questions regarding our privacy policy, please contact us: ksanisale@dewaltgeorgia.com TEL: + (995) 577 95 55 82
terms.securityIntro: dewaltgeorgia.com devotes a lot of time to customer security, we try in every way not to save time and energy so that customers feel safe using our services.
terms.accountSecurityDesc: All accounts are accessible with a single username and password. Each customer must take care of their account security (keep the password and username secret). In case of forgetting or losing the password, it can be replaced with a new one.
terms.accountRequirements: Each customer on dewaltgeorgia.com can have only one account. Registration requires full name and surname, address, contact information and personal number. dewaltgeorgia.com offers customers the highest security measures. In case of any security-related problem, contact us so that we can respond quickly and resolve the problem. Any personal information from dewaltgeorgia.com servers is transmitted to the customer's computer with 256-bit encryption and Secure Socket Link (SSL).
terms.securityTipsDesc: Security is extremely important to us. That's why we want to introduce you to security standards. Try to log into the system through our website and not from any other page that allows this. Check! Your browser's address field should say: https://www.dewaltgeorgia.com and only then enter your personal data.
terms.systemSecurityDesc: Due to the uniqueness of the system, its hacking or any kind of damage is virtually impossible. Also, all customer personal information is fully protected. We ensure strict confidentiality.
